name: Blessings
description: Divine boons granted by gods or powerful celestial beings. A character can have only one blessing at a time, and a blessing cannot be removed except by the Wish spell or the deity who granted it.

blessings.name: Blessing of Health
blessings.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, to a maximum of 22.

blessings.name: Blessing of Protection
blessings.description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.

blessings.name: Blessing of Magic Resistance
blessings.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

mechanicalEffect.advantage: saving throws against spells and magical effects

blessings.name: Blessing of Understanding
blessings.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, to a maximum of 22.

blessings.name: Blessing of Valhalla
blessings.description: The blessing grants the power to summon spirit warriors. You can blow a spectral war horn as an action, summoning 3d4 + 3 berserker spirits that fight alongside you for 1 hour or until destroyed. Once used, this property cannot be used again for 7 days.

blessings.name: Blessing of Weapon Enhancement
blessings.description: One nonmagical weapon in your possession becomes a +1 weapon whenever you wield it.

blessings.name: Blessing of Wound Closure
blessings.description: You regain 1d6 hit points at the start of your turn if you have at least 1 hit point. In addition, if you are stabilized, you regain consciousness at the start of your next turn with 1 HP.

mechanicalEffect.regeneration: 1d6 HP at start of turn (if above 0 HP)
mechanicalEffect.stabilization: regain consciousness next turn with 1 HP
